channel.title: Server Helper V1
channel.description:
Well in the last hour i had nothing to do, So i made a server Helper Its not really good but it has all the help u need. Features include:
Running Server Compiler (Special thanks to A.E.M) Run and Compiler Start Silabsofts client from there - (client application needs to be in the same folder as this server helper)
And very soon ill put a tutorial on there for beginners on " How to Make a server " The tutorial will come from God of Ikiliki's Sticky Topic anyways here is the Code [code] @echo off cls Title Server Helper V1 Color 9A echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: echo ::::::::::Welcome to::::::::::::: echo :::::::Server helper V1:::::::::: echo ::::::::::Made by:::::::::::::::: echo ::::::::Dog eats Dog::::::::::::: echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Pause :menu Echo. Echo Type "Com" to Compile Your server Echo Type "Run" to Run your server Echo Type "CR" To Compile and Run Your server Echo Type "RS" To Run Silabsofts Client "if u have" Echo Type "Ex" to Exit the Program Echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==Com goto Compile if %option%==Ex goto exit if %option%==RS goto silabsofts if %option%==CR goto Complierrun if %option%==Run goto Run :Compile @echo off title compiler bla color 0a Java Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause :exit exit :silabsofts cls JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 goto menu :Run cls java -cp . server pause CALL compiler CALL server runner goto menu :Complierrun if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error2) echo Files Compiled Succesfully [/code]
Have fun " more updates to come to it ". [br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 05:59:31 PM[/size][hr]Post a reply of wat u think?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 06:08:04 PM[/size][hr]Is anyone ganna post a reply on wat they think[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 06:37:01 PM[/size][hr]Its not leeched. How could i leech it , it has my name written all over it. And very soon i said im adding a tut on how to make a server. Why would i do all the effort of that and its leeched. Its because i wouldn't, Its not leeched my friend :)

item.title: Server Helper V1
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Well in the last hour i had nothing to do, So i made a server Helper Its not really good but it has all the help u need. Features include:

Running Server
Compiler (Special thanks to A.E.M)
Run and Compiler
Start Silabsofts client from there - (client application needs to be in the same folder as this server helper)

And very soon ill put a tutorial on there for beginners on " How to Make a server " The tutorial will come from God of Ikiliki’s Sticky Topic anyways here is the Code

@echo off
cls
Title Server Helper V1
Color 9A
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::::::::::Welcome to:::::::::::::
echo :::::::Server helper V1::::::::::
echo ::::::::::Made by::::::::::::::::
echo ::::::::Dog eats Dog:::::::::::::
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Pause
:menu
Echo.
Echo Type "Com" to Compile Your server
Echo Type "Run" to Run your server
Echo Type "CR" To Compile and Run Your server
Echo Type "RS" To Run Silabsofts Client "if u have"
Echo Type "Ex" to Exit the Program
Echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Com goto Compile
if %option%==Ex goto exit
if %option%==RS goto silabsofts
if %option%==CR goto Complierrun
if %option%==Run goto Run
:Compile
@echo off
title compiler bla
color 0a
Java Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause
:exit
exit
:silabsofts
cls
JAVA  -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
goto menu
:Run
cls
java -cp . server
pause
CALL compiler
CALL server runner
goto menu
:Complierrun
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error2)
echo Files Compiled Succesfully

Have fun " more updates to come to it ".
[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 05:59:31 PM[/size][hr]Post a reply of wat u think?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 06:08:04 PM[/size][hr]Is anyone ganna post a reply on wat they think[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 06:37:01 PM[/size][hr]Its not leeched. How could i leech it , it has my name written all over it. And very soon i said im adding a tut on how to make a server. Why would i do all the effort of that and its leeched. Its because i wouldn’t, Its not leeched my friend

Read full topic
